verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1525> <WG5627> again <WG3825> into <WG1519> the synagogue <WG4864>; and <WG2532> there was <WG2258> <WG5713> a man <WG444> there <WG1563> which had <WG2192> <WG5723> a withered <WG3583> <WG5772> hand <WG5495>.
